about.title: About Anclora
about.subtitle: Redefining luxury real estate in Mallorca through technology, expertise, and exceptional service.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Anclora Private Estates was born from a clear vision: to transform the buying and selling experience of luxury properties in Mallorca by combining deep local knowledge with cutting-edge technology.
story.p2: In 2020, we identified a unique opportunity in the Mallorcan real estate market. While traditional agencies relied on conventional methods, we bet on innovation: algorithmic segmentation, intelligent automation, and an international network of HNWI buyers.
story.p3: Today, Anclora is not just a real estate agency. We are a business group with two verticals: Anclora Private Estates (B2C) and Anclora Cognitive Solutions (B2B), offering AI services to other agencies in the sector.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content: We believe that luxury real estate requires a perfect balance between advanced technology and human touch. Our algorithms find the ideal buyers, but it is our personal relationships that close the deals.

excellence.description: Unwavering commitment to quality in every interaction
